item.title: Poke Lang
item.description: poke-lang is a bytecode interpreted language inspired by Lua, Gleam, and the “Crafting Interpreters” book. It is designed to resemble a statically typed Lua and serve as a scripting language for handling small tasks.

item.title: PokeGelo-CLI
item.description: PokeGelo-CLI is a command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to simplify sending HTTP requests, making it easier and more intuitive compared to using curl & more flexible compared to postman.
